sent.orig: If you want to speak good English, you need to repeat, repeat, and repeat.
sent.trans: 如果你想说一口流利的英语，你就必须重复，重复，再重复。

sent.orig: If you want to speak good English.you need to repeat,repeat,repeat.This is the only secrete.
sent.trans: 如果你想说一口漂亮的英语。你就必须重复，重复，再重复。这是唯一的秘诀。

sent.orig: D. Ask client to repeat. Repeat in conversational or loud tones if needed.
sent.trans: 嘱受检者重复。必要时可用谈话语调或大声重复。

sent.orig: We must repeat and again repeat; facility will come with labour.
sent.trans: 我们必须一再重复；熟练来自劳动。

sent.orig: As some of the elderly poor memory, and often forget or repeat medication.
sent.trans: 一些老年人由于记忆力差，常忘记或重复服药。
